Industry Researchers and Vendors

India being one of the leading countries in terms of patient population of a variety of therapy areas, healthcare facilities and infrastructure, skilled resources, and suitable technologies, has been a prime destination for clinical trials. Regulatory changes in the past decade affected the influx of global trials and there have been several missed opportunities to bring in newer treatment to benefit patients. However, things have started to turn around and once again, India is becoming a sort after country for global trials.

STEM council has been established to work together with Sponsors/CROs and researchers who want to conduct their clinical trials in India and support them with information on the research environment and current regulatory and trial-specific requirements. At no cost, we can work together at any stage of your trial, provide expertise in disease/patient management, consult in regulatory framework, training needs, and assist in project deliverables.

We work closely with industry experts and vendors who are experienced in executing clinical trials and this comes as an advantage of working with the known and experienced to ensure highest quality.
